name: NoVax Warrior
description:
After a self taught mother discovered she must get her child vaxxed for allow him go to public school she declare war to Big Pharm. In her journey she will be facing all the major threats in humanity, from the government cover-up to the chemtrails and maybe even uncover an unknown mystery in a strange abandoned military base ... while her final objective will be the fight for the true freedom of choose what's better for the life of her kid and everyone around them .... 

Help her reach the Big Pharma and put an end on it !

*Control Description

You will control the angry mother with the arrows keys or the usual WASD combination, aim with the mouse and shoot at aim spot with mouse left button and throw poxbomb with right button (poxbomb have minimum range, not expect angry mommy be strong like superman !)

If on your travel you reach a house with a Pox Party sign you can recharge your bombs at maximum so, do it before fight the Boss Stage :)

Enjoy the small demo, more will come if I will get time to update the game: aliens, chemtrails plane,  more Boss and better level design (my skill are poor) 

Disclaimer: The game is just for fun and I made it for the Holistic3D Lockdown Game Jam. It's just my very first demo made in just 2 days and half so ....  keep good with the comments :)

The WebGL version has some strange graphical glitch, if you can just download the windows version for better performance.
